remarks: If all functions of a finite set of functions over the nonnegative integers are finitely supported, then the support of all these functions is contained in a finite set of sequential integers starting at 0. (Contributed by AV, 2-Oct-2019.)

$d M f m $.
$d R f m $.
$d V f m $.
$d Z f m $.
